objects.specification: A neutral light grey floor with a smooth matte finish and subtle non-slip texture, forming a bright and inviting surface that complements the classroom décor.
A seamless light-colored matte wall painted in a soft neutral tone, featuring clean straight edges and a smooth finish ideal for mounting teaching aids and posters.
A seamless light-colored matte wall painted in a soft neutral tone, featuring clean straight edges and a smooth finish ideal for mounting teaching aids and posters.
A seamless light-colored matte wall painted in a soft neutral tone, featuring clean straight edges and a smooth finish ideal for mounting teaching aids and posters.
A seamless light-colored matte wall painted in a soft neutral tone, featuring clean straight edges and a smooth finish ideal for mounting teaching aids and posters.
A large rectangular window with a slim light-colored frame and clear glass pane, allowing abundant natural light to enter and brighten the classroom.
A large rectangular dark green chalkboard with a thin wooden frame and a smooth writing surface designed for clear chalk visibility, mounted flush to the front wall.
A spacious rectangular teacher’s desk crafted from dark wood with a polished matte finish, featuring sturdy tapered legs, a modesty panel, and a smooth flat tabletop.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a white glossy plastic housing, featuring ventilation grilles, a front lens, and neatly concealed cabling.
An educational dinosaur poster showcasing colorful dinosaur illustrations and informative text, laminated with a slim protective frame for thematic wall decoration.
An educational dinosaur poster showcasing colorful dinosaur illustrations and informative text, laminated with a slim protective frame for thematic wall decoration.

A tall wooden bookshelf with five open shelves, crafted from medium-dark wood, filled with colorful dinosaur books and small models, featuring side slats and an open-back design.
A realistic T-Rex dinosaur model sculpted with fine scale details in a light tan finish, featuring muscular contours and an imposing posture.
A detailed Triceratops model in muted earth tones, featuring pronounced horns, a textured frill, and a sturdy crouched stance.
A lush green potted plant with glossy broad leaves emerging from a simple neutral ceramic pot that has a subtle matte texture.
A circular wall clock with a crisp white face, bold black Arabic numerals, slender black hands, and a thin black metal frame for clear time reading.
A modern rectangular ceiling light panel with a diffused white cover and slim flush-mounted profile, providing even illumination across the room.
